Description: COLLECTING POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR OUR UPCOMING PROJECTS IN IRAQ!A rail systems engineer is responsible for:Operate locomotives used by train lines.Check trains for mechanical problems.Make minor or major repairs.Order parts for train.Return locomotives to service station for repairs.Operate automated systems that move passenger and freight cars into place in rail yards.Add or remove cars from the locomotive.Load and unload freight.Watch and operate instruments that measure air pressure, speed and battery power, and work the train's controls.Operate air brakes and throttles.Skills
Skills: Qualifications:High school diploma or GED.Previous work experience as a Locomotive Engineer.Advanced knowledge of mechanical and electrical locomotive systems.Excellent diagnostic skills.Be aware of number of cars and contents.
